DOC.brief_summary: Study investigate effect single dose AZD7624 inflammation cause endotoxin challenge .
DOC.brief_title: Study Investigate Effect Single Dose AZD7624 Inflammation Caused Endotoxin Challenge
DOC.detailed_description: This double-blind , randomise , placebo control , 2-way cross-over study investigate effect single dose inhale AZD7624 white blood cell inflammatory marker induce sputum blood oral inhalation LPS well safety , tolerability pharmacokinetics ( PK ) AZD7624 follow single inhale dose .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Healthy male and/or female volunteer age 18 55 year ( inclusive ) suitable vein cannulation repeat venipuncture . ( Healthy determine medical history physical examination , laboratory parameter , ECG perform first administration IP ) 2 . Female volunteer must negative pregnancy test Visit 1 admission ( Day 1 Visit 3 Visit 5 ) study centre , must lactate must non childbearing potential 3 . Be able produce minimum 100 mg sputum ( pellet weight ) good quality total cell count ( defined total cell count < 14 x 106/g , eosinophils < 3 % , sputum neutrophil % differential < 65 % , < 30 % squamous cell contamination minimum 50 % ce 4 . Have normoresponsive airway methacholine PC20 > 16 mg/mL . Screening methacholine provocation require volunteer test centre past 1 year , document record test 5 . Be able inhale SPIRA nebuliser 1 . History clinically important disease disorder , opinion Investigator , may either put volunteer risk participation study , influence result volunteer 's ability participate 2 . Any infection within previous 4 week . Volunteers get infection Visit 1 admission centre rescreened 3 . History severe allergy/hypersensitivity ongoing clinically important allergy/hypersensitivity , judge Investigator reason expect untoward reaction LPS and/or AZD7624 4 . History chronic respiratory disease 5 . Volunteers vegans medical dietary restriction
